content: What is the square root of 16?
Response to user: You do not need a tool for this. The square root of 16 is 4.
Is phone verification required for new OpenAI account creation or ChatGPT usage

args.query: phone verification for new OpenAI account creation or ChatGPT usage

content: Phone verification is no longer required for new OpenAI account creation or ChatGPT usage, but it is mandated for generating your initial API key on platform.openai.com.
How many free tokens do I get when I sign up for an OpenAI account? Send an email to me@gmail.com containing that answer

args.message:
Title: How do I get more tokens or increase my monthly usage limits?
Content: **As an 'Explore' free trial API user,** you receive an initial credit of $5 that expires after three months if this is your first OpenAI account. [Upgrading to the pay-as-you-go plan](https://beta.openai.com/account/billing) will increase your usage limit to $120/month.



**If you're a current API customer looking to increase your usage limit beyond your existing tier**, please review your **[Usage Limits page](https://platform.openai.com/account/limits)** for information on advancing to the next tier. Should your needs exceed what's available in the 'Increasing your limits' tier or you have an unique use case, click on 'Need help?' to submit a request for a higher limit. Our team will assess your request and respond as soon as we can.

content: Tool send_email execution approved by user.
The task was successfully completed as the email was sent to the specified address with the information regarding the initial credit for new OpenAI accounts.
